ActFood and Drugs Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the MEDICAL DEVICES REGULATIONS (1293 - QUALITY SYSTEMS) by specifying the qualifications an independent third-party organization must have in order to be recognized as a registrar for the purpose of issuing quality system certificates to manufacturers of medical devices (Classes II, III and IV).
